lyrics.lyric: Try
Put your make up on
Get your nails done
Curl your hair
Run the extra mile
Keep it slim so they like you, do they like you?
lyrics.tlyric: 保持苗条，让他们喜欢你，但他们真的喜欢你吗？

lyrics.lyric: Get your sexy on
Don't be shy, girl
Take it off
This is what you want, to belong, so they like you
lyrics.tlyric: 这就是你想要的，属于你的，所以他们喜欢你

lyrics.lyric: Do you like you?
You don't have to try so hard
lyrics.tlyric: 你不必竭尽全力尝试改变

lyrics.lyric: You don't have to, give it all away
lyrics.tlyric: 你不必让自己毫无保留

lyrics.lyric: You just have to get up, get up, get up, get up

lyrics.lyric: You don't have to choose, buy it all, so they like you
